other.title: Tip #1
other.text:
The last greatest hero has fallen, and the quest called for adventurers.

You're on a 7-day journey to the most challenging dungeon in the realm.

other.title: Tip #2
other.text:
On your journey, you'll meet a lot of obstacles. Dungeon is the last one for you to worry about.

It's always wise to do things within your abilities.

other.title: Tip #3
other.text:
Every outcome of an event can be determined by your Combat, Physique, Wit, and Charm.

Your valuables (Food, Herbs, Coins, Accessory, and Weapon) sometimes also come into play.

other.title: Tip #4
other.text:
Combat affects how effective you can use melee and ranged weapons.

Physique decides your fitness and how well you can heal yourself.

other.title: Tip #5
other.text:
Wit reflects your knowledge and the level of magic practice.

Charm influences your persuasion on others and morale.

other.title: Tip #6
other.text:
Your weapon plays an important role on your survival on your journey.

When you choose to fight your enemy, the more damage you can do, the more likely you'll win.

other.title: Tip #7
other.text:
All of your weapons have limited usage and a chance of breaking.

It's wise when not to engage your enemies when your weapon is close to its end.

other.title: Tip #8
other.text:
Once you deplete your weapon, you'll have to fight with your fists until you find another weapon.

If you're confident about your Combat skills, losing a weapon might not bother you.

other.title: Tip #9
other.text: Your accessory will give you bonus attribute points or other magical benefits, such as doubling the amount of coins you can find.

other.title: - The End -
other.text: You have died on the journey to defeat the dungeon. Your remains are soon to be found by other adventurers. May what you left help the next conquer the greatest dungeon.

other.title: - The End -
other.text: You have defeated the most dangerous dungeon and returned in one piece. More adventurers are inspired by your victory and determination. They are soon to be on the journey to the greatest dungeon.

looting.title: EXPLORING THE @LOC
looting.text: After an exploring attempt, you found:

looting.title: EXPLORING THE @LOC
looting.text: After some exploring, you found a weapon:

looting.title: EXPLORING THE @LOC
looting.text: After some exploring, you found a piece of accessory:

travel.title: The Death Crossroad
travel.text: In front of you presents two separate paths to different destinations. You decide to go to:

travel.title: Raiders In A Distance
travel.text: You noticed some raiders are handing around in your route. You decide to:

result.text: You approach the raiders without caution. They knocked you down and took all your possessions and weapon.
You won the fight.
You used objects in the environment for you advantage and successfully went through the area without being seen.
You persuaded the raiders that you're a lonely traveller trying to pass. They let you pass with accpetance.

travel.title: IT'S AN AMBUSH
travel.text: A group of raiders ambushed you, and they demand half of your valuable items.

result.text: The raiders quickly took off with half of your possesions.
You proposed a really compelling compromise. The raiders agreed to only take half of your food and coins.
You suspected the ambush and gave them a decoy bag. While the raiders are searching for valuable items, you already took off with all your stuff.
The raiders beat ypu up before taking all of your stuff.
You won the fight
You convinced them that you have nothing valuable to them. The raiders left you feeling disappointed.
You ran away with your full speed. The raiders couldn't even catch up and gave up very soon
You demonstrated a few karate moves and didn't impress the raiders. They tried to take you down, but GUESS WHAT? The raiders couldn't stand a chance against you.

travel.title: IT'S AN AMBUSH
travel.text: A group of raiders ambushed you, and they demand all of your valuable items.

result.text: The raiders quickly took off with all of your possesions.
You proposed a really compelling compromise. The raiders agreed to only take all of your coins.
You suspected the ambush and gave them a decoy bag. While the raiders are searching for valuable items, you already took off with all your stuff.
The raiders beat ypu up before taking all of your stuff.
You won the fight
You convinced them that you have nothing valuable to them. The raiders left you feeling disappointed.
You ran away with your full speed. The raiders couldn't even catch up and gave up very soon
You demonstrated a few karate moves and didn't impress the raiders. They tried to take you down, but GUESS WHAT? The raiders couldn't stand a chance against you.

travel.title: IT'S AN AMBUSH
travel.text: A group of raiders ambushed you, and they demand to give up your weapon.

result.text: The raiders quickly took off with your weapon.
You suspected the ambush and gave them a decoy weapon. While the raiders are testing the fake weapon, you already are nowhere to be found.
The raiders beat ypu up before taking all of your stuff.
You won the fight
You convinced them that you have nothing valuable to them. The raiders left you feeling disappointed.
You ran away with your full speed. The raiders couldn't even catch up and gave up very soon
You demonstrated a few karate moves and didn't impress the raiders. They tried to take you down, but GUESS WHAT? The raiders couldn't stand a chance against you.

travel.title: A Trader Doing Bussiness
travel.text: A trader carrying a enormous backpack stands besides the road asking for a trade.

explore.title: A Random Adventurer
explore.text: You discovered an adventurer exploring the same place. They didn't see you though.

result.text: Everything went okay. You and the adventurer even exchanged dungeon tips!
You couldn't trust the adventurer, so you quickly took off without throughly exploring the area.

explore.title: An Unwelcome Explorer
explore.text: During your exploration, you noticed a raider a few meters from you without knowing you're there.

result.text: The raider had the faster move and defeated you with ease. They took off with all your valuables.
You won the fight.
You knocked down the raider with one hit and took away their valuables.
As you were trying to walk away, you knocked something down to the floor and alerted the raider. They attacked you and ran away.
As you were trying to walk away, you knocked something down to the floor and alerted the raider. You and the raider started a duo.
You walked away quietly.

explore.title: The Storm Is Coming
explore.text: An unseasonably severe and perilous storm is now upon you. It's better to stay inside.

result.text: You were not prepared for this storm. The wind blew away half of your valuables.
You know exactly what to do during a storm. You tied yourself and your valuables to a tree. And the wind had no chance ruinning your adventure.
You set up a fire and waited until the storm passed.

explore.title: Unexpected Crawler
explore.text: A wondering crawler discovers you around the corner and prepares to charge. You decide to:

result.text: You
You outran the
You lost.
You won.

rest.title: Another Day In A Quiet Place
rest.text:
As the sun is going down, you find a quiet spot for resting throught the night. There's no sign of other dangers, but you can't be so sure of it.

You decided to:

result.text: You ate some food and went to sleep. The next day will be full of challenges again.

You stayed up all night, but there was nothing from the dark trying to harm you. You feel very tired the next day.

However, it gave you time to think about all your mistakes.

rest.title: A Busy Tavern
rest.text: Just before the sun falls, you find a crowded tavern in a nearby town. It's full of people. There's also a room for rent. 8 coins a night.

result.text: You didn't have enough money to rent the room. You left the tavern when it was closed. You couldn't find somewhere to sleep and stayed up all night. You feel tired the next day.
The owner saw you as an inspiring, selfless adventure, doing good deeds for others and sacrificing yourself. They gave you the room for free.
You went to the room, ate some food and went to sleep. The next day will be full of challenges again.
You didn't have enough money to buy anything. You left the tavern when it was closed. You couldn't find somewhere to sleep and stayed up all night. You feel tired the next day.
You know your limit and didn't have fun all night. You went to your room when you felt tired. The next day will be full of challenges again.
You drank some beer and gambled until the tavern was closed. You fell asleep in the tavern. But you still feel very tired the next day.
